title: LeBlanc was not compensated.
body:
Hi!

When LeBlanc had her silence removed, it also removed the sound effect for proccing her sigil.

I'd like for her to receive a new sound effect for proccing her sigil - a satisfying reward that lets the player know they executed her combo correctly. It's a minor detail, but it should be there. 

I have faith in the sound team to come up with something awesome.


Thanks a ton!

replies.body:
> Hi!
> 
> When LeBlanc had her silence removed, it also removed the sound effect for proccing her sigil.
> 
> I'd like for her to receive a new sound effect for proccing her sigil - a satisfying reward that lets the player know they executed her combo correctly. It's a minor detail, but it should be there. 
> 
> I have faith in the sound team to come up with something awesome.
> 
> 
> Thanks a ton!

Noted! Annnnnnd, good call =)

+1

It's helpful to know when you've pulled off your combo correctly, especially on a champion as complex as LeBlanc.
Yeah.. right now it seem empty
